::Battera::

She heard the transmission on her commlink.
"Yeah, I'm fine. I'm here at the Maximal ship. But I still haven't 
talked to the leader yet.  I was told to wait to see him and I'm 
still waiting.  Sorry about missing the checking."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> "Com on, Come on!"
> 
> Brix/Octociz keep pushing the three bounty hunters down the 
hallways 
> of the ship, right into the brig. He puts each of them in seperate 
> cells, and covers the entraces with a soundproof shield so they 
can't 
> communicate with each other. Before that Octociz came forward and 
> removed there transmiters. Octociz looked to Rex and Firearm.
> 
> "You guys can do what you want now. We worked pretty good as a 
team, 
> but I got to go to the CR Chamber, so that I can meet Ramulus at my 
> pod."
> 
> Octociz/Brix heads to the other side of the ship and enters the CR 
> Chamber.
> 
> 
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois was pacing in the embassy, worried. Last night he was 
supposed 
> to get a check-in from everybody. Now he's wondering if his plan 
> failed before it even began. He sent a message.
> 
> "Battera, Cybershark and Soundwave. Are you okay? Please give me a 
> statis report. I need to know if you're okay."
> 
> Vulois began pacing again.
